title: When someone keeps spamming their mastery 6 emote

replies.body: I just spam mastery 7 in return :     ^)
What about Mastery 7 then? :^)

Rito finally decided u did gud enough to deserve that 3d token?
Congrats bud ^^

*same here FeelsGoodMan :^)*
I'm going to get my 1st lv 7 on Tahm Kench so I can simultaneously spam laugh and the lv 7 emote like a true pro.

https://media3.giphy.com/media/HwRPra9jBVN3q/200.gif

*I just found this gif and wanted to use it. It's not relevant to the topic in any possible way.*

It is relevant, when you simultaneously spam laugh and the mastery taunt as Tahm Kench you cause the enemy team to have their sexuality confused. Thats how I win my ranked games playing the Tahm Cruise in the jungle.
http://25.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_lm691mDLfZ1qeijvdo1_500.gif
Do you know why people call privateers pirates?

https://media0.giphy.com/media/kMBnh3m8vOamA/200.gif

Exept for that question.
BECAUSE THEY ARRRRRRRRRRRRR!!!!!!!!!

> A privateer (sometimes called corsair or buccaneer) was a private person or ship authorized by a government by letters of marque to attack foreign vessels during wartime, and take them as prizes. Captured ships were subject to condemnation and sale under prize law, with the proceeds divided between the privateer shipowners and crew. Privateering was a way of mobilizing armed ships and sailors as naval auxiliaries.

> Historically, the distinction between a privateer and a pirate has been blurred, sometimes depending on the source as to which label was correct. At times, pirates sought dubious government sanction to operate under a veil of legitimacy.

't seems like they ARRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRn't :^)
